function.description: Returns a randomized value based on the optional parameter value.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The value that will lock the the return value between 0 (inclusive) and 'value' (exclusive). If a list argument is provided, the result is a random entry from the list. If no parameter or a negative number is provided, a random floating point number between 0 and 1 will be generated.

example.title: Get a number between 1 and 6 (inclusive)
